Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network

Class TopologicalLink

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.TopologicalLink
public class TopologicalLink
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an link (edge) from an graph
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    TopologicalLink​(int srcNode, int destNode, float delay, float bw)
    creates an new link-object
